clinic_details.name: HealthCare Plus Clinic
clinic_details.address: 123 Medical Center Dr, Suite 100, New York, NY 10001

location_directions.description: We are located in the heart of downtown, easily accessible by public transportation or car.
location_directions.by_subway: Take the Red Line to Medical Center Station, exit at Main Street. We're a 3-minute walk heading north.
location_directions.by_bus: Routes 15, 22, and 44 stop directly in front of our building.
location_directions.by_car: From I-95, take Exit 23 (Medical District). Turn right on Hospital Avenue, then left on Medical Center Dr.

parking_information.description: We offer convenient parking options for our patients.
parking_information.onsite_parking: Free parking garage attached to our building. Enter from Medical Center Dr. Parking validation available at reception.
parking_information.street_parking: Metered street parking available on Medical Center Dr and surrounding streets ($2/hour).
parking_information.nearby_lots: Public parking lot on Corner St (2 blocks away) - $5 flat rate.

insurance_and_billing.insurance_notes: We are in-network with most major insurance providers. Please bring your insurance card to your appointment. We'll verify your coverage and benefits.
payment_methods: Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover)

billing_policies.copay: Copays are due at the time of service. Please bring your insurance card.
billing_policies.self_pay: Self-pay patients receive a 15% discount when paying in full at time of service.
billing_policies.balance_billing: You will receive a statement for any balance after insurance processing. Payment is due within 30 days.
billing_policies.financial_assistance: Financial assistance programs available for qualifying patients. Ask our billing department for details.

first_visit.arrive_early: Please arrive 15 minutes early to complete new patient paperwork.
required_documents: Valid photo ID (driver's license or passport)
Medical history form (can be downloaded from website)
what_to_bring: List of current medications and dosages
Questions or concerns you want to discuss
first_visit.forms: New patient forms can be downloaded from our website and completed at home to save time.

what_to_bring: Any new symptoms or concerns to discuss
Test results from other providers (if applicable)

special_instructions.fasting_bloodwork: If bloodwork is ordered, you may need to fast for 8-12 hours. We'll inform you if this is necessary.
special_instructions.physical_exam: Wear comfortable, loose-fitting clothing. You may need to change into a gown.
special_instructions.bring_someone: You're welcome to bring a family member or friend to your appointment.

cancellation_policy.policy: We require at least 24 hours notice to cancel or reschedule an appointment. Late cancellations or no-shows may be subject to a $50 fee.
cancellation_policy.how_to_cancel: Call our office at +1-555-123-4567 or use our online patient portal.
cancellation_policy.emergency: We understand emergencies happen. Please call us as soon as possible.

late_arrival_policy.policy: We have a 10-minute grace period. If you arrive more than 10 minutes late, we may need to reschedule your appointment to avoid delays for other patients.
late_arrival_policy.running_late: If you're running late, please call us immediately. We'll do our best to accommodate you.

prescription_refills.policy: Allow 48 hours for prescription refill requests. Contact your pharmacy or our office.
prescription_refills.restrictions: Controlled substances require an office visit and cannot be refilled over the phone.

test_results.timeline: Most test results are available within 3-5 business days.
test_results.notification: We'll call you with results. You can also access them through our patient portal.

covid19_protocols.masks: Masks are optional for vaccinated patients but recommended during flu season (November-March).
covid19_protocols.symptoms: If you have COVID-19 symptoms (fever, cough, loss of taste/smell), please call before coming in. We may recommend telehealth.
covid19_protocols.testing: COVID-19 testing available with or without symptoms. Rapid tests provide results in 15 minutes.
covid19_protocols.telehealth: Telehealth appointments available for many visit types. Ask when scheduling.
covid19_protocols.safety_measures: We follow CDC guidelines including enhanced cleaning, air filtration, and physical distancing in waiting areas.

minors.policy: Patients under 18 must be accompanied by a parent or legal guardian.
minors.exceptions: Teens 16+ may be seen alone for certain confidential services with prior parental consent on file.

privacy.hipaa: We comply with all HIPAA regulations to protect your privacy.
privacy.records_release: Medical records can be requested with a signed authorization form. There may be a small copying fee.

general_consultation.description: Standard visit for non-urgent health concerns, illness, or injury. Appropriate for most common conditions.
general_consultation.examples: Cold/flu, minor injuries, rashes, infections, chronic condition management

follow_up.description: Brief appointment to review test results, check progress, or adjust treatment plan.
follow_up.examples: Post-treatment check, medication adjustment, test result review

physical_exam.description: Comprehensive examination including vital signs, health history review, and preventive care discussion.
physical_exam.examples: Annual physical, sports physical, employment physical, school physical

specialist_consultation.description: In-depth consultation for complex conditions or specialized care needs.

contact_information.emergency: Call 911 or go to nearest emergency room

additional_services.lab_work: On-site lab for blood work, urinalysis, and other common tests. Most results same-day or next-day.
additional_services.immunizations: All standard vaccines available including flu shots, COVID-19, shingles, and travel vaccines.
additional_services.minor_procedures: We perform minor procedures like wart removal, skin biopsies, and wound care.
additional_services.chronic_disease: Comprehensive management for diabetes, hypertension, asthma, and other chronic conditions.
additional_services.preventive_care: Annual physicals, cancer screenings, and wellness visits.
